name: G.E.T.
description:
G.E.T. (Gather, Explore, Technologize) is a 3D first person open world adventure-survival game.
On your journey you will progress through different ages, beginning from the stone age and finishing in the far future.
As you progress further and further through the ages, you will acquire more crafting recipes and inventions that will make life in your colony easier, safer and ever more complex.



Gathering and stockpiling is an essential need of the game:
  • Gather, craft & make technological progress
  • Invent and deploy advanced inventions



A big open-world, which is waiting to be discovered:
  • Dungeons, caves, abandoned ruins and other civilizations
  • Enemys, friends and a big undiscovered wilderness in the universum of G.E.T.



Start from the beginning:
  • Start your journey in the stone age
  • Identify the basic technology for the next era to progress through the ages
  • Unlock more blueprints, new inventions, equipment and more.



Machines play an important part, not only in your daily life:
  • Build simple or enormous and complex machines by connecting them
  • Let them work for you and expand your possibilities



You start as a unexperienced pioneer:
  • Develop your abilities while doing task to understanding in how to do it gets.



Your home is your foothold in this untamed and dangerous environment:
  • Decide where and how your base of operation should be built
  • Your option on how to build your base, as well as how to upgrade it, expand constantly



The world of G.E.T. should be a mysterious one, where you can find new things and places everywhere you go:
  • Procedural world for a individual experience
  • Voxel-based environment - change the environment in your favor




    The world constantly experiences changes in weather:
    • Different seasons & regions
    • Adapt your colony to the current environment
    • Use the weather to your advantage



    Start as a naked pioneer:
    • Extend your library of usable options by doing different challenges
    • Unlock new faces, clothes and accessories

    Supported languages

    G.E.T. will be translated into many different languages.
    Please note that the Pre-Alpha, Alpha, and Beta will be solely in English.
    For the final release, we will add languages as much as possible.
